column1: Please see the recommended citation for this dataset on the Contributors tab

column2: Age, if specific age not given then range provided (i.e. 50s = 50-59)
Reported date (i.e. public announcement date) DD-MM-YYYY
Week of Report (Sundays are 1st day of week)
If no travel history, type of locally acquired infection
Cumulative number of tests (* denotes a change in reported testing definition)
